title: Article 2 - CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
content:
Article 2 - CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
State Regulations

Part 700 - Definitions, Samples And Tests (§ 700.1 to 700.4)

Part 701 - Classifications-surface Waters And Groundwaters (§ 701.1)

Part 702 - Derivation and use of Standards and Guidance Values (§ 702.1 to 702.22)

Part 703 - Surface Water and Groundwater Quality Standards and Groundwater Effluent Limitations (§ 703.1 to 703.8 to 703.11)

Part 704 - Criteria Governing Thermal Discharges (§ 704.1 to 704.7)

Part 705 - References (§ 705.1 to 705.4)

Part 706 - APPENDICES FOR PARTS 700-705 (§ 706.1 to 706.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
